original_title: Boys Club II: Island House Adventure
overview: Four of the boys from Boys Club are back...and they’ve brought three of their friends along for a vacation adventure at the famous Island House Key West resort. They are on vacation and ready to play. And play they do...by the pool, in hotel rooms and in the Spa at the island house. Shot entirely on location in Key West, Florida, this film contains some of the hottest scenes ever shown on camera including a three-way with a double penetration as big-dicked newcomer Brad White and Michael Lennox show tiny little Trey Maddox what it’s like to be fucked by two huge dicks at the same time! Seven hot, young and full of cum boys play, frolic and fuck all day and night in four of the wettest and rawest scenes ever captured on film.
title: Boys Club II: Island House Adventure
